title: Storier Website
desc: The main website for Storier with a new design using using React, Algolia, and Stripe
desclong: Enhanced the entirety of storier.fm with a new responsive design. Update included dynamic animations and a lazy loading searchable library integrated with algolia.

title: jonesevan.com
desc: jonesevan.com (this site) designed and created by me.
desclong:
This is the third iteration of my portfolio site, and I think it is (almost) perfect! The site allows for dynamic style changing using css variables and has a custom built context for creating modals (like this one).

This site was really fun to make and I consider it one of my greatest accomplishments. Check out the source code to see how it was built.

title: Newage Events
desc: A page for finding information about upcoming events. Built using Vue, Laravel, and ButterCMS.
desclong: Besides implementing the HTML and CSS for the page using Vue, I also designed the data schema for the various modules and implemented the retrieval of this data from ButterCMS.

title: Storier App
desc: An app I worked on for kids to enjoy audiobooks utilizing React Native, Firebase, Stripe, and Algolia.
desclong: One of the main features I added to the storier app was the token system. This system gave tokens to users every week that could be used to purchase audio books.
